name: assignment3-q1
description: Created the table on pg4admin inside a **students** database with the following query, ```sql CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS students ( 	student_id			SERIAL	PRIMARY KEY, 	first_name			TEXT	NOT NULL, 	last_name			TEXT	NOT NULL, 	email				TEXT	UNIQUE NOT NULL, 	enrollment_date		DATE ); ```
author: Young-hoon Kim
